mdRecord.dcterms:title: Princess Elizabeth and Prince Phillip at Mount Vernon, November 1, 1951
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain, 1926-
Philip, Prince, consort of Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain, 1921-2021
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Princess Elizabeth signs the guest book in the central passage of the Mansion at Mount Vernon. Mrs. Hope Powel, Regent of Mount Vernon Ladies' Association stands at center next to John F. Simmons, Chief of Protocol of the State Department with Prince Philip at far right. Members of the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association stand nearby.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Central Passage
